metadata.dc:author: Romero, T
Ponce, G
Abad, C
Aguilar, J
metadata.dc:description: A 69 year old man was diagnosed of cardiac tamponade. At surgery a large hemopericardias was evacuated, cardiac and pericardial metastasis of an oat cell carcinoma was demonstrated. The patient died 4 weeks later. A review of the literature is done about patients with cardiac tamponade as the first manifestation of a neoplastic process.
metadata.dc:title: Taponamiento cardiaco como primera manifestación clínica de un carcinoma de células pequeñas.
[Cardiac tamponade as first clinical manifestation of small cell carcinoma].
